summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1683 for the improvement of the east half of 20th Avenue Northeast from the south line of East 65th Street to the south line of University Place Addition to the City of Seattle, and 21st Avenue Northeast and 22nd Avenue Northeast, from the south line of East 65th Street to the south line of University Place Addition in the City of Seattle; and East 63rd Street, from 20th Avenue Northeast to Ravenna Avenue; by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 17706 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
